title: 03/24/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/24/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Chris Simms about why he thinks Tyreek Hill is better than Devanta Adams. Juwan Howard reacts to Chris Webber picking Houston as his National Champions. And Dave Roberts makes a World Series prediction.
